Question: What options do I have to make payments on the website?
Answer: You have multiple payment options: All credit and debit cards. All wallets, such as PayTM, Amazon, Airtel, PhonePe, Freecharge, Mobikwik & Jio.

Question: Are there any hidden charges when I make a payment?
Answer: No, there are no hidden charges. All listed prices are inclusive of all taxes. We provide free shipping on all orders.
